author: PTI
title: All BJP MPs to release Rs 1 crore from MPLAD funds for coronavirus relief: Nadda
description: In his tweets, he also said that all party MPs and MLAs will donate their one month salary towards it as well.
content:
BJP president J P Nadda on Saturday announced that all party MPs will release Rs one crore from their annual development fund to the central relief fund to fight coronavirus pandemic.
In his tweets, he also said that all party MPs and MLAs will donate their … [+518 chars]
